description:
As Bananya and Droopy-eared Bananya are walking alongside the river, a strange wand floats their way. They ask the elder about it, and he says it belongs to the legendary Rainbow Bananya. So they set out to return the wand to its owner, but... nyanya?
Source: Crunchyroll

titles.title: Bananya and the Lost Item, Nya
ばなにゃとおとしもの にゃ
